subject: Direction
author: billliscomb
full_text:
Two new files in "12 21 07" folder.  Played with the R75 shortwave a 
bit tonight.  The R75 may not scan fast enough - I'll play with 
adjusting the filters next.  I recorded a bit of it scanning and ran 
that thru EVPmaker and got some clips - not great but it worked, so 
went back to the doctor giving a talk raw audio on EVPmaker and got 
these two.  Guess I'll make a box....
Willy
